Name: I_Darkness
About the game: I_Darkness is a puzzle game in an escape room scenario created by one person using Unreal Engine 4. Puzzles are designed to test the player's general knowledge and riddle solving skills. Explore the beautiful mansion with its many rooms and corridors. Learn how difficult it is to leave the house when darkness surrounds you. - Investigate and learn how to activate mechanisms to unlock access to further content - Solve puzzles and collect items required to finish the game
Meta Title: I_Darkness: Jul 15, 2020, Piotr Kowalski and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on I_Darkness? Check out the release date (Jul 15, 2020), developer insights from Piotr Kowalski, and a complete game summary.
